short_description: Unofficial helper for Wordle-style games — suggests optimal next guesses and shows short definitions.
full_description: Wordle Wizard (Unofficial) helps you make better guesses in Wordle-style puzzles. It detects your attempts in-game, tracks feedback, and suggests the next optimal guess using deterministic solver logic. No account or network tracking is required — the solver and word lists run locally. Includes an optional meanings database for short definitions of suggested words.
privacy_summary: No personal data is collected. The extension stores bundled resources locally and does not send gameplay or user data to external servers.
